name: Lightgun Game
description:
How to play - Extract from zip and run LightgunGame.exe

Controls -
W/A/D - Lean around cover
Left Click - Shoot/Select
Scroll up/down - Aim sensitivity

Survey to complete after playing, please complete once you are done playing.
This survey should be completed once for each iteration.
https://forms.office.com/e/mDcTmCJshB

Assets credit: Environment models and gun model from https://www.kenney.nl/

What data will be collected: Player name (manual input not automatic), Time, Country, Time zone, Platform, Time in cover, Time not in cover, Enemies remaining, Enemy names, Player health remaining, Player current encounter, Gun accuracy.

What your data will be used for: Analysis of gameplay events, improvement of gameplay.

Who is responsible for your data: The creator of the game and survey, Lewis Mackay is responsible for data.

Who will be able to see your data: Lewis Mackay, Lecturer Fraser Simpson and Lecturer Gareth Robinson, Unity Analytics (Data will be anonymous), you (AppData\LocalLow\KritsoGameDesign\LightgunGame\Analytics).
